body: needs less of the bitch husband and more housewife-rape-begins-to-slowly-enjoy-it-while-slowly-starts-to-hate-it-with-her-husband

Masaki won't be able to counter him since he does not know he is fucking Prostitutes who have gathered evidence against him and that they are Hired By Kouta, they will leave him when their deed is done unless he has more money to throw at them. it is not a happy NTR as every 1 thinks.
